description: Elective patellofemoral arthroplasty for specific disease states (Evidence: pg no: 5, L205-L206)
scope: Patellofemoral joint replacement (Evidence: pg no: 5, L204-L216)

documentation: ONE of the following disease states: Advanced symptomatic primary or secondary isolated patellofemoral osteoarthritis (PFOA), Failed extensor mechanism unloading procedures, or Symptomatic patellofemoral cartilage defects greater than 4 cm2 after failed cartilage repair procedure (Evidence: pg no: 5, L207-L213)
Failure of at least 3 months of non-surgical conservative management (Evidence: pg no: 5, L214)
Functional limitation secondary to knee pathology which interferes with ability to perform age-appropriate daily activities (Evidence: pg no: 5, L215-L216)

exclusions: Knee instability (ligaments and/or menisci injuries) (Evidence: pg no: 5, L222)
Limb malalignment (valgus deformity greater than 8 degrees or varus deformity greater than 5 degrees) (Evidence: pg no: 5, L223)
Fixed flexion contracture greater than 10 degrees (Evidence: pg no: 5, L224)

codes.description: Arthroplasty, patella; without prosthesis (Evidence: pg no: 7, L294)
Arthroplasty, patella; with prosthesis (Evidence: pg no: 7, L295)
